h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicaara.m ^a^T2.0001^ea^ ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho ^a^V2.0002^ea^, dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] savitakkasavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaare khandhe pa.ticca vitakko. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaare khandhe pa.ticca vitakko. (2)

[03] savitakkasavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkaavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaare khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaare khandhe pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (3)

[03] savitakkasavicaara.m ^a^M2.0002^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ^a^T2.0002^ea^ ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. (4)

[03] savitakkasavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaare khandhe pa.ticca vitakko cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaare khandhe pa.ticca vitakko ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. (5)

[03] savitakkasavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkavicaaramatto ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vitakko ca...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa vitakko ca. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vitakko ca...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa vitakko ca. (6)

[03] savitakkasavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkavicaaramatto ^a^V2.0003^ea^ ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vitakko ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa vitakko ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vitakko ca ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa vitakko ca ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. (7)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ avitakkavicaaramatta.m ^a^T2.0003^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] avitakkavicaaramatta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vitakka.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vitakka.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa. (2)

[03] avitakkavicaaramatta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkaavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- avitakkavicaaramatte khandhe pa.ticca vicaaro cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m ^a^M2.0003^ea^; vitakka.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramatte khandhe pa.ticca vicaaro ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vitakka.m pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (3)

[03] avitakkavicaaramatta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- vitakka.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vitakka.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. (4)

[03] avitakkavicaaramatta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vicaaro ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa vicaaro ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramatta.m ^a^T2.0004^ea^ eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vicaaro ^a^V2.0004^ea^ ca ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa vicaaro ca ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. (5)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ avitakkaavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkaavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- avitakkaavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; vicaara.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkaavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vicaara.m pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m, khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, vicaara.m pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca vicaaro. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca tayo mahaabhuutaa...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
[03] avitakkaavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa. (2)

[03] avitakkaavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vicaara.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vicaara.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca vitakko. (3)

[03] avitakkaavicaara.m ^a^M2.0004^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca ^a^T2.0005^ea^ savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa; mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (4)

[03] avitakkaavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- vicaara.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vicaara.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa; mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^V2.0005^ea^ vatthu.m pa.ticca vitakko; mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vicaaro ca. (5)

[03] avitakkaavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkavicaaramatto ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca vitakko ca. (6)

[03] avitakkaavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca vitakko ca; mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (7)

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^T2.0006^ea^ savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca vitakko. (2)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkaavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (3)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m ^a^M2.0005^ea^ eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa; savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (4)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca ^a^V2.0006^ea^ avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca vitakko; savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (5)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkavicaaramatto ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vitakko ca...pe0... dve khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa vitakko ca. (6)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti ^a^T2.0007^ea^ hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vitakko ca...pe0... dve khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa vitakko ca; savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (7)

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ avitakkavicaaramatta~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vitakka~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa. (1)

[03] avitakkavicaaramatta~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha~nca vicaara~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca vicaara~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha~nca vicaara~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca vicaara~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (2)

[03] avitakkavicaaramatta~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkaavicaaro dhammo ^a^V2.0007^ea^ uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- avitakkavicaaramatte khandhe ca vicaara~nca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; avitakkavicaaramatte khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; vitakka~nca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^M2.0006^ea^ avitakkavicaaramatte khandhe ca vicaara~nca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramatte ^a^T2.0008^ea^ khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vitakka~nca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramatte khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca vicaaro. (3)

[03] avitakkavicaaramatta~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vitakka~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa; vitakka~nca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (4)

[03] avitakkavicaaramatta~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha~nca vicaara~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe ca vicaara~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha~nca vicaara~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe ca vicaara~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vicaaro ca...pe0... dve khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa vicaaro ca. (5)

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkavicaaramatta~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha~nca vitakka~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca vitakka~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m ^a^T2.0009^ea^ khandha~nca vitakka~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca vitakka~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkavicaaramatta~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkaavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca vitakka~nca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca vitakka~nca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (2)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca ^a^V2.0008^ea^ avitakkavicaaramatta~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha~nca vitakka~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe ca ^a^M2.0007^ea^ vitakka~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha~nca vitakka~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe ca vitakka~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. (3)

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkavicaaramatta~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha~nca vitakka~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca vitakka~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkavicaaramatta~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkaavicaaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca vitakka~nca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^T2.0010^ea^ ruupa.m. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca vitakka~nca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (2)

[03] savitakkasavicaara~nca avitakkavicaaramatta~nca avitakkaavicaara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha~nca vitakka~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe ca vitakka~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca eko khandho, dve khandhe ca vitakka~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa; savitakkasavicaare khandhe ca vitakka~nca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (3)

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] savitakkasavicaara.m ^a^V2.0009^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaare khandhe pa.ticca vitakko. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] savitakkasavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkavicaaramatto ca dhammaa uppajjanti aaramma.napaccayaa -- savitakkasavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vitakko ca...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa vitakko ca. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ avitakkavicaaramatta.m ^a^M2.0008^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo uppajjati ^a^T2.0011^ea^ aaramma.napaccayaa -- avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] avitakkavicaaramatta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- vitakka.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)
[03] avitakkavicaaramatta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkaavicaaro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- avitakkavicaaramatte khandhe pa.ticca vicaaro. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] avitakkavicaaramatta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti aaramma.napaccayaa -- avitakkavicaaramatta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa vicaaro ca...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa vicaaro ca pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (4)

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ avitakkaavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkaavicaaro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- avitakkaavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkaavicaara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, vatthu.m pa.ticca vicaaro. (1)
[03] avitakkaavicaara.m ^a^V2.0010^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa. (2)

[03] avitakkaavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- vicaara.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vicaara.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ^a^T2.0012^ea^. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca vitakko. (3)

[03] avitakkaavicaara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti aaramma.napaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa vicaaro ca. (4)

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicaaro dhammo savitakkasavicaarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati; pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati; savitakkasavicaaraa ^a^T2.0053^ea^ jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa phala.m paccavekkhati. ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. savitakkasavicaare khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. savitakkasavicaare khandhe aarabbha savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa uppajjanti. [03] avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo savitakkasavicaarassa ca avitakkavicaaramattassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- avitakkavicaaramattaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa phala.m paccavekkhati; ta.m aarabbha savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. avitakkavicaaramatte ^a^T2.0056^ea^ khandhe ca vitakka~nca aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. avitakkavicaaramatte khandhe ca vitakka~nca aarabbha savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. [03] 71^b^.^eb^ avitakkaavicaaro dhammo avitakkaavicaarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m avitakkaavicaarassa maggassa phalassa vicaarassa ca aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena avitakkaavicaaracittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. avitakkaavicaaraa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. avitakkaavicaare khandhe ca vicaara~nca aarabbha avitakkaavicaaraa khandhaa uppajjanti. [03] avitakkaavicaaro ^a^M2.0043^ea^ dhammo savitakkasavicaarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa avitakkaavicaaraa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa phala.m paccavekkhanti; ta.m aarabbha savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa uppajjanti. ariyaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m ^a^T2.0057^ea^ gotrabhussa vodaanassa savitakkasavicaarassa maggassa phalassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m ^a^V2.0051^ea^... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... avitakkaavicaare khandhe ca vicaara~nca aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. avitakkaavicaare khandhe ca vicaara~nca aarabbha savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa uppajjanti. [03] 127^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicaaro dhammo avitakkaavicaarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] avitakkavicaaramatto dhammo avitakkaavicaarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vitakko cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vitakko ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vitakko ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] 128^b^.^eb^ avitakkaavicaaro ^a^T2.0132^ea^ dhammo avitakkaavicaarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ ^a^M2.0094^ea^ -- avitakkaavicaaraa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^V2.0106^ea^ ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vicaaro cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkaavicaaraa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vicaaro ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; vicaaro vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; vatthu vicaarassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu avitakkaavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m vicaarassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- avitakkaavicaaraa khandhaa ca vicaaro ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] avitakkaavicaaro dhammo savitakkasavicaarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu savitakkasavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu savitakkasavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] avitakkaavicaaro dhammo avitakkavicaaramattassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena ^a^T2.0133^ea^ paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m vitakkassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m vitakkassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] 129^b^.^eb^ avitakkavicaaramatto ^a^M2.0095^ea^ ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa avitakkaavicaarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vicaaro ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vicaaro ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vicaaro ^a^T2.0134^ea^ ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] (avitakkavicaaramattamuulakaa pa~nca pa~nhaa. avasesaa sahajaatapaccayasadisaa.)

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ avitakkaavicaaro dhammo avitakkaavicaarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- avitakkaavicaaro eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ^a^T2.0136^ea^ dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... vicaaro cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^V2.0109^ea^ avitakkaavicaaro eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; vicaaro vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo, vatthu vicaarassa atthipaccayena paccayo; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... mahaabhuutaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m...pe0... mahaabhuutaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa ^a^M2.0097^ea^ sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo, cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. vatthu avitakkaavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m vicaarassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- avitakkaavicaaraa khandhaa ca vicaaro ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] avitakkaavicaaro dhammo savitakkasavicaarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu ^a^T2.0137^ea^ savitakkasavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. vatthu savitakkasavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] avitakkaavicaaro dhammo avitakkavicaaramattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicaaro avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vicaaro avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m vitakkassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha ^a^V2.0110^ea^ vitakko uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha vitakko uppajjati. vatthu avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m vitakkassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] avitakkaavicaaro dhammo avitakkavicaaramattassa ca avitakkaavicaarassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicaaro avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ^a^T2.0138^ea^ ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vicaaro avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m ^a^M2.0098^ea^ ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m vicaarassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu avitakkavicaaramattaana.m khandhaana.m vicaarassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] avitakkaavicaaro dhammo savitakkasavicaarassa ca avitakkavicaaramattassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu savitakkasavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m vitakkassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. vatthu savitakkasavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m vitakkassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. (5)

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa savitakkasavicaarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- savitakkasavicaaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaaro ^a^T2.0139^ea^ eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] savitakkasavicaaro ^a^V2.0111^ea^ ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa avitakkavicaaramattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaataa -- savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca vatthu ca vitakkassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca vatthu ca vitakkassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa avitakkaavicaarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m^eb^. sahajaataa -- savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa ^a^M2.0099^ea^ -- savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa -- savitakkasavicaaraa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] savitakkasavicaaro ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa savitakkasavicaarassa ca avitakkavicaaramattassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- savitakkasavicaaro eko khandho ^a^T2.0140^ea^ ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m vitakkassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m vitakkassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (4)

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ avitakkavicaaramatto ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa savitakkasavicaarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- vitakko ca vatthu ca savitakkasavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vitakko ca vatthu ca savitakkasavicaaraana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] avitakkavicaaramatto ^a^T2.0141^ea^ ca avitakkaavicaaro ca dhammaa avitakkaavicaarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. sahajaataa^eb^ -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vicaaro ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. sahajaataa ^a^M2.0100^ea^ -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. sahajaato -- vitakko ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. sahajaataa -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vatthu ca vicaarassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vicaaro ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vitakko ca mahaabhuutaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vatthu ca vicaarassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vicaaro ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vitakko ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa -- avitakkavicaaramattaa khandhaa ca vitakko ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa pa~ncati.msa, naaaramma.ne pa~ncati.msa, naadhipatiyaa pa~ncati.msa, naanantare pa~ncati.msa, nasamanantare pa~ncati.msa, nasahajaate ekuunati.msa, naa~n~nama~n~ne ekuunati.msa, nanissaye ekuunati.msa, naupanissaye catutti.msa, napurejaate pa~ncati.msa, napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake naaahaare naindriye najhaane namagge pa~ncati.msa, nasampayutte ekuunati.msa, navippayutte sattaviisa, noatthiyaa sattaviisa, nonatthiyaa pa~ncati.msa, novigate pa~ncati.msa, noavigate sattaviisa.

[03] piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati ^a^T2.0154^ea^ hetupaccayaa -- piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca sukhasahagataa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe ^a^V2.0123^ea^ pa.ticca eko khandho. pa.tisandhikkha.ne piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca sukhasahagataa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. (2)

[03] piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. pa.tisandhikkha.ne piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. (3)

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ piitisahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa... adhipatipaccayaa... (pa.tisandhikkha.ne natthi) anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa... sahajaatapaccayaa... a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa... nissayapaccayaa... upanissayapaccayaa... purejaatapaccayaa... (purejaate pa.tisandhikkha.ne natthi) aasevanapaccayaa... (aasevane vipaaka.m natthi) kammapaccayaa... vipaakapaccayaa... aahaara...pe0... indriya... jhaana... magga... sampayutta... vippayutta... atthi... natthi... vigata... avigatapaccayaa.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T2.0155^ea^ ^a^M2.0110^ea^ dasa, aaramma.ne dasa, adhipatiyaa dasa, anantare samanantare sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye upanissaye purejaate aasevane kamme vipaake aahaare indriye jhaane magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyaa natthiyaa vigate avigate sabbattha dasa.
[06] (eva.m anulomaga.nanaa ga.netabbaa.)
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ piitisahagata.m ^a^V2.0124^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m piitisahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] piitisahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m piitisahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca sukhasahagataa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (2)

[03] piitisahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammaa uppajjanti nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m piitisahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (3)

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ sukhasahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m sukhasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. (1)

[03] sukhasahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m sukhasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca piitisahagataa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve ^a^T2.0156^ea^ khandhaa. (2)

[03] sukhasahagata.m ^a^M2.0111^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammaa uppajjanti nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m sukhasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. (3)

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ upekkhaasahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upekkhaasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m ^a^V2.0125^ea^ upekkhaasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne upekkhaasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca piitisahagataa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca sukhasahagataa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. (2)

[03] piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammaa uppajjanti nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca ^a^T2.0157^ea^ eko khandho. (3)

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ piitisahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa (naadhipatipa.tisandhikkha.ne paripu.n.na.m)... napurejaatapaccayaa... (``aruupe''ti niyaametabba.m ``pa.tisandhikkha.ne''ti ca) napacchaajaatapaccayaa... naaasevanapaccayaa.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ piitisahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- piitisahagate khandhe pa.ticca piitisahagataa cetanaa.
[03] piitisahagata.m ^a^M2.0112^ea^ ^a^V2.0126^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- piitisahagate khandhe pa.ticca sukhasahagataa cetanaa.
[03] (iminaa kaara.nena dasa pa~nhaa vitthaaretabbaa.)
[03] 12^b^.^eb^ piitisahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca piitisahagato dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa...pe0... (paripu.n.na.m, pa.tisandhi natthi).

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ sukhasahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa -- sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. (1)
[03] upekkhaasahagata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upekkhaasahagato dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa -- catuvi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. (1)
[03] (namaggapaccayaa nahetupaccayasadisa.m. moho natthi. navippayuttapaccayaa paripu.n.na.m aruupapa~nhameva.)

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T2.0158^ea^ ^a^V2.0127^ea^ dasa, naadhipatiyaa dasa, napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake dasa, najhaane dve, namagge dasa, navippayutte dasa (paccaniiya.m paripu.n.na.m kaatabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M2.0113^ea^ naadhipatiyaa dasa, napurejaate dasa, napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake navippayutte dasa.
[06] (anulomapaccaniiya.m vitthaarena ga.netabba.m.)
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne dasa, anantare dasa, samanantare dasa, sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye ^a^V2.0128^ea^ upanissaye purejaate aasevane kamme vipaake aahaare indriye jhaane sabbe dasa, magge eka.m, sampayutte dasa, vippayutte atthiyaa natthiyaa vigate avigate sabbe dasa.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] pa.ticcavaaro.
[03] (sahajaatavaaropi paccayavaaropi nissayavaaropi sa.msa.t.thavaaropi sampayuttavaaropi pa.ticcavaarasadisaa.)

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ piitisahagato dhammo piitisahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- piitisahagataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne piitisahagataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena ^a^T2.0159^ea^ paccayo. (1)

[03] piitisahagato ^a^M2.0114^ea^ dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- piitisahagataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m sukhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] piitisahagato dhammo piitisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo ^a^V2.0129^ea^ -- piitisahagataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m piitisahagataana~nca sukhasahagataana~nca khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... piitisahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... piitisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa...pe0... (sukhamuule tii.ni).
[03] upekkhaasahagato dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- upekkhaasahagataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammaa piitisahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... sukhasahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... piitisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca hetuu sampayuttakaana.m piitisahagataana~nca sukhasahagataana~nca khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ piitisahagato dhammo piitisahagatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T2.0160^ea^ paccayo -- piitisahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m piitisahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, piitisahagataa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa ta.m piitisahagatena cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa piitisahagatena cittena piitisahagate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. piitisahagate khandhe piitisahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha piitisahagato raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. piitisahagate khandhe aarabbha piitisahagataa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)

[03] piitisahagato ^a^M2.0115^ea^ dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- piitisahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m sukhasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, piitisahagataa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa ta.m sukhasahagatena ^a^V2.0130^ea^ cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa sukhasahagatena cittena piitisahagate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. piitisahagate khandhe sukhasahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha sukhasahagato raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. piitisahagate khandhe aarabbha sukhasahagataa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)

[03] piitisahagato ^a^T2.0161^ea^ dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- piitisahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m upekkhaasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, piitisahagataa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa ta.m upekkhaasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa upekkhaasahagatena cittena piitisahagate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. piitisahagate khandhe upekkhaasahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha upekkhaasahagato raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati. cetopariya~naa.nena piitisahagatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti, piitisahagataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. piitisahagate khandhe aarabbha upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] piitisahagato dhammo piitisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- piitisahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena ^a^T2.0162^ea^ paccavekkhati, piitisahagataa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa ta.m piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena piitisahagate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti ^a^M2.0116^ea^, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. piitisahagate khandhe piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. piitisahagate khandhe aarabbha piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (4)

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ sukhasahagato ^a^V2.0131^ea^ dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sukhasahagato dhammo piitisahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... piitisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sukhasahagate khandhe aarabbha piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (4)

[03] upekkhaasahagato dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- upekkhaasahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m upekkhaasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, upekkhaasahagataa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa ta.m upekkhaasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa upekkhaasahagatena cittena upekkhaasahagate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. upekkhaasahagate khandhe upekkhaasahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato ^a^T2.0163^ea^ vipassanti assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha upekkhaasahagato raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati. cetopariya~naa.nena upekkhaasahagatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. upekkhaasahagate khandhe aarabbha upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)

[03] upekkhaasahagato dhammo piitisahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... sukhasahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... piitisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- upekkhaasahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa siila.m ^a^M2.0117^ea^ samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati, upekkhaasahagataa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa, ta.m piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena upekkhaasahagate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. upekkhaasahagate khandhe piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca ^a^T2.0164^ea^ cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assaadenti ^a^V2.0132^ea^ abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. upekkhaasahagate khandhe aarabbha piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammaa piitisahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... sukhasahagatassa dhammassa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa...pe0... piitisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe upekkhaasahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha upekkhaasahagato raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati. cetopariya~naa.nena piitisahagatasukhasahagatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. piitisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe aarabbha upekkhaasahagataa khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
[03] piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammaa piitisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m). (4)

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ piitisahagato dhammo piitisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- piitisahagatena ^a^T2.0165^ea^ cittena daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ^a^M2.0118^ea^ piitisahagatena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, piitisahagataa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa piitisahagatena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. piitisahagate khandhe piitisahagatena cittena garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa piitisahagato raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- piitisahagataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] piitisahagato ^a^V2.0133^ea^ dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- piitisahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa...pe0.... ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- piitisahagataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m sukhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] piitisahagato dhammo upekkhaasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- piitisahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cittena (sa.mkhitta.m). (3)

[03] piitisahagato dhammo piitisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- piitisahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa...pe0.... ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- piitisahagataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m piitisahagataana~nca sukhasahagataana~nca khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ sukhasahagato ^a^T2.0166^ea^ dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sukhasahagatena cittena daana.m datvaa...pe0.... ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sukhasahagataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] piitisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammaa piitisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca saddha.m upanissaaya piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca siila.m... suta.m... caaga.m... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m... moha.m... maana.m... di.t.thi.m... patthana.m upanissaaya piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. piitisahagata~nca sukhasahagata~nca jhaana.m uppaadeti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti. piitisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena adinna.m aadiyati, musaa bha.nati, pisu.na.m bha.nati, sampha.m palapati, sandhi.m chindati, nillopa.m harati, ekaagaarika.m karoti, paripanthe ti.t.thati, paradaara.m gacchati, gaamaghaata.m karoti, nigamaghaata.m karoti. piitisahagataa ca sukhasahagataa ca saddhaa...pe0... patthanaa piitisahagataaya ca sukhasahagataaya ca saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 32^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa tii.ni, naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca.
[06] (~natvaa ga.netabba.m.)
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca.
[06] (eva.m anumajjantena ga.netabba.m.)
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^T2.0200^ea^ ^a^M2.0145^ea^ ^a^V2.0164^ea^ aaramma.ne tii.ni, anantare tii.ni, samanantare tii.ni, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate tii.ni, aasevane tii.ni, kamme tii.ni, vipaake eka.m, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge dve, sampayutte tii.ni, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa tii.ni, natthiyaa tii.ni, vigate tii.ni, avigate tii.ni.
[06] (eva.m anumajjantena ga.netabba.m.)
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] pa.ticcavaaro.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sahajaato dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- dassanena pahaatabba.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe sahajaataa...pe0....

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ dassanena ^a^V2.0165^ea^ pahaatabba.m dhamma.m paccayaa dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa... tii.ni.

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m dhamma.m paccayaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa khandhaa. (3)

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa sattarasa, aaramma.ne satta, adhipatiyaa sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajaate sattarasa, a~n~nama~n~ne satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejaate satta, aasevane ^a^M2.0150^ea^ satta, kamme sattarasa, vipaake eka.m, aahaare sattarasa, indriye sattarasa, jhaane sattarasa, magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyaa sattarasa, natthiyaa satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabba~nca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabba~nca dhamma.m paccayaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- bhaavanaaya ^a^M2.0154^ea^ pahaatabbe khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa cetanaa. (1)

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabba.m dhamma.m paccayaa dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa (paripu.n.na.m, pa.tisandhi natthi), naaahaarapaccayaa -- baahira.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... naindriyapaccayaa -- baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... mahaabhuute paccayaa ruupajiivitindriya.m... najhaanapaccayaa -- pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... baahira.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... namaggapaccayaa -- ahetuka.m nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m ^a^T2.0211^ea^ eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... nasampayuttapaccayaa, navippayuttapaccayaa -- aruupe dassanena pahaatabba.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa...pe0... aruupe bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m dhamma.m paccayaa nevadassanena...pe0... aruupe nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... nonatthipaccayaa... novigatapaccayaa.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa satta, naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa sattarasa, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate sattarasa, naaasevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipaake sattarasa, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m ^a^V2.0175^ea^, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca.
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa sattarasa, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate ^a^M2.0155^ea^ satta, napacchaajaate sattarasa, naaasevane sattarasa ^a^T2.0212^ea^, nakamme satta, navipaake sattarasa, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne satta, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne satta, nissaye satta, upanissaye satta, purejaate satta, aasevane satta, kamme satta, vipaake eka.m, aahaare satta, indriye satta, jhaane satta, magge cha, sampayutte satta, vippayutte satta, atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa satta, vigate satta, avigate satta (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] paccayavaaro.
[06] (nissayavaaro ^a^V2.0176^ea^ paccayasadiso kaatabbo.)

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- dassanena pahaatabba.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa. (1)
[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa...pe0.... (1)

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nevadassanena ^a^T2.0213^ea^ nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya ^a^M2.0156^ea^ pahaatabba.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa...pe0.... (1)
[03] 61^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa (sabbaani padaani vitthaaretabbaani tii.ni, tii.ni).

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V2.0177^ea^ tii.ni, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, anantare tii.ni, samanantare tii.ni, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate tii.ni, aasevane tii.ni, kamme tii.ni, vipaake eka.m, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte tii.ni, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa tii.ni, natthiyaa tii.ni, vigate tii.ni, avigate tii.ni.
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate khandhe sa.msa.t.tho vicikicchaasahagato moho. (1)
[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- uddhaccasahagate khandhe sa.msa.t.tho uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nevadassanena ^a^T2.0214^ea^ nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ dassanena ^a^M2.0157^ea^ ^a^V2.0178^ea^ pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa... napurejaatapaccayaa... napacchaajaatapaccayaa... naaasevanapaccayaa... nakammapaccayaa... navipaakapaccayaa... -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya...pe0... najhaanapaccayaa -- pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... namaggapaccayaa -- ahetuka.m...pe0... nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo...pe0... navippayuttapaccayaa... tii.ni.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane tii.ni, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni.
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane tii.ni, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, navippayutte tii.ni.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne tii.ni, anantare tii.ni, samanantare tii.ni, sahajaate tii.ni ^a^V2.0179^ea^, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate tii.ni, aasevane tii.ni, kamme tii.ni, vipaake eka.m, aahaare tii.ni, indriye ^a^T2.0215^ea^ tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge dve, sampayutte tii.ni, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa tii.ni, natthiyaa tii.ni, vigate tii.ni, avigate tii.ni.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] sa.msa.t.thavaaro.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ dassanena ^a^M2.0158^ea^ pahaatabba.m dhamma.m sampayutto dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa (sampayuttavaaro sa.msa.t.thavaarasadiso).
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- dassanena pahaatabbaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- dassanena pahaatabbaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] dassanena ^a^V2.0180^ea^ pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- dassanena pahaatabbaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 70^b^.^eb^ bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo...pe0... dhammassa ^a^T2.0216^ea^ hetupaccayena paccayo -- bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa...pe0... bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo bhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa ca dhammassa...pe0... bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa hetuu ^a^M2.0159^ea^ sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa...pe0... nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- dassanena pahaatabba.m raaga.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha dassanena pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati. dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati, di.t.thi.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha dassanena pahaatabbo ^a^T2.0217^ea^ raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati ^a^V2.0181^ea^. dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati, vicikiccha.m aarabbha vicikicchaa uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati. dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m aarabbha dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati. (1)

[03] dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa dassanena pahaatabbe pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. dassanena pahaatabbe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti. cetopariya~naa.nena dassanena pahaatabbacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. dassanena pahaatabbaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo bhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m raaga.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati ^a^M2.0160^ea^. bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati, uddhacca.m aarabbha uddhacca.m uppajjati. bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati, bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m domanassa.m aarabbha bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati. (1)

[03] bhaavanaaya ^a^T2.0218^ea^ pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m raaga.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha dassanena pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati. uddhacca.m aarabbha di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati. bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m domanassa.m aarabbha dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati. (2)

[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbe pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. bhaavanaaya pahaatabbe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariya~naa.nena bhaavanaaya pahaatabbacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa ^a^V2.0182^ea^, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati. ariyaa ^a^T2.0219^ea^ maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti ^a^M2.0161^ea^, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...pe0... nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha dassanena pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati. pubbe suci.n.naani assaadeti abhinandati...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha ^a^T2.0220^ea^ dassanena pahaatabbo raago...pe0... di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... jhaane parihiine vippa.tisaarissa dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati. cakkhu.m assaadeti abhinandati...pe0... sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbe khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha ^a^V2.0183^ea^ dassanena pahaatabbo raago...pe0... di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati. (2)

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo bhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati. pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbe khandhe assaadeti...pe0... ta.m aarabbha bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati. (3)

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ ^a^M2.0162^ea^ -- dassanena pahaatabba.m raaga.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa dassanena pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati; di.t.thi.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa dassanena pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ ^a^T2.0221^ea^ -- dassanena pahaatabbaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- dassanena pahaatabbaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- dassanena pahaatabbaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ bhaavanaaya ^a^V2.0184^ea^ pahaatabbo dhammo bhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m raaga.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo raago uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m raaga.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa dassanena pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)

[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa ^a^T2.0222^ea^ dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo bhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] nevadassanena ^a^T2.0235^ea^ nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m...pe0.... naanaakkha.nikaa -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] 92^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- dassanena pahaatabbaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0236^ea^. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- dassanena pahaatabbaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (idampi dassanena sadisa.m).

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa ^a^T2.0238^ea^ vatthussa...pe0... vatthu khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, sota.m...pe0... kaaya.m... ruupe...pe0... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa ^a^V2.0197^ea^ khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena ^a^M2.0175^ea^ paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa...pe0... ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbo dhammo dassanena pahaatabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ cakkhu.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha dassanena pahaatabbo raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, dassanena pahaatabba.m domanassa.m uppajjati, sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti...pe0... vatthu dassanena pahaatabbaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m dhamma.m nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati vippayuttapaccayaa -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m... dve khandhe...pe0... khandhaa vatthu.m vippayuttapaccayaa. cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m khandhe vippayuttapaccayaa. vicikicchaasahagata.m uddhaccasahagata.m moha.m paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, moha.m vippayuttapaccayaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe paccayaa vatthu, vatthu.m paccayaa khandhaa. khandhaa vatthu.m vippayuttapaccayaa. vatthu khandhe vippayuttapaccayaa. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m paccayaa tayo mahaabhuutaa...pe0... mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m ^a^M2.0201^ea^, khandhe vippayuttapaccayaa. cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m; vatthu.m paccayaa nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa khandhaa. (1)

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m dhamma.m paccayaa dassanena pahaatabbahetuko dhammo ^a^T2.0272^ea^ uppajjati vippayuttapaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa khandhaa, vatthu.m vippayuttapaccayaa. vicikicchaasahagata.m moha.m paccayaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa, vatthu.m vippayuttapaccayaa. (2)

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ dassanena pahaatabbahetuka.m dhamma.m paccayaa dassanena pahaatabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa (paripu.n.na.m, pa.tisandhi natthi), naaahaarapaccayaa -- baahira.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... naindriyapaccayaa -- baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... mahaabhuute paccayaa ruupajiivitindriya.m... najhaanapaccayaa -- pa~ncavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... namaggapaccayaa -- ahetuka.m eka.m...pe0... nasampayuttapaccayaa... navippayuttapaccayaa... (pa.ticcavaarapaccaniiye navippayuttasadisa.m, ninnaana.m. ekaadasa). nonatthipaccayaa... novigatapaccayaa.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T2.0279^ea^ pa~nca, naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa sattarasa, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate terasa, napacchaajaate sattarasa, naaasevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipaake sattarasa, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte ekaadasa, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0233^ea^ naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa sattarasa, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate ^a^M2.0207^ea^ terasa, napacchaajaate sattarasa, naaasevane sattarasa, nakamme satta, navipaake sattarasa, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte ekaadasa, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca ( eva.m ga.netabba.m).
