[03] 105^b^.^eb^ nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko dhammo nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nevadassanena ^a^T2.0313^ea^ nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa ^a^M2.0233^ea^ khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa...pe0... ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m...pe0.... (1)

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahaatabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena ^a^V2.0261^ea^ paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato moho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha dassanena pahaatabbahetuko raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, dassanena pahaatabbahetuka.m domanassa.m uppajjati, vatthu dassanena pahaatabbahetukaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nevadassanena ^a^T2.0314^ea^ nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko dhammo bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati...pe0... vatthu bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahaatabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato moho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aarabbha vicikicchaasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca uppajjanti...pe0... vatthu.m aarabbha...pe0... vatthu vicikicchaasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko dhammo bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aarabbha uddhaccasahagataa ^a^M2.0234^ea^ khandhaa ca moho ca uppajjanti...pe0... vatthu.m aarabbha...pe0... vatthu uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. (5)

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ dassanena ^a^T2.0315^ea^ pahaatabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko ca dhammaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- dassanena pahaatabbahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo ^a^V2.0262^ea^ ...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... vicikicchaasahagato eko khandho ca moho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0.... (1)

[03] dassanena pahaatabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko ca dhammaa nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. sahajaataa -- vicikicchaasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. sahajaataa -- vicikicchaasahagataa khandhaa ca vatthu ca mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa -- vicikicchaasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa -- dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] dassanena ^a^T2.0316^ea^ pahaatabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko ca dhammaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukassa ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- vicikicchaasahagato eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... vicikicchaasahagato eko khandho ca moho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca moho ca...pe0.... (3)

[03] bhaavanaaya ^a^M2.0235^ea^ pahaatabbahetuko ca nevadassanena nabhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko ca dhammaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m. tisso pa~nhaa, dassanena nayena vibhajitabbaa, ``uddhacca''nti niyaametabba.m) natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo....

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V2.0263^ea^ ekaadasa, aaramma.ne ekaviisa, adhipatiyaa dasa, anantare sattarasa, samanantare sattarasa, sahajaate sattarasa, a~n~nama~n~ne ekaadasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekaviisa, purejaate pa~nca, pacchaajaate pa~nca, aasevane sattarasa, kamme satta, vipaake eka.m, aahaare satta, indriye satta, jhaane satta, magge satta, sampayutte ekaadasa, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa sattarasa, natthiyaa sattarasa, vigate sattarasa, avigate sattarasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V2.0267^ea^ ekaviisa, naaaramma.ne naadhipatiyaa naanantare nasamanantare nasahajaate naa~n~nama~n~ne nanissaye naupanissaye napurejaate ^a^M2.0239^ea^ napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake naaahaare naindriye najhaane namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyaa nonatthiyaa novigate noavigate sabbattha ekaviisa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne ekaadasa, naadhipatiyaa naanantare nasamanantare ekaadasa, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake naaahaare naindriye najhaane namagge ekaadasa, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte pa~nca ^a^T2.0322^ea^, nonatthiyaa ekaadasa, novigate ekaadasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0268^ea^ aaramma.ne ekaviisa, adhipatiyaa dasa, anantare sattarasa, samanantare sattarasa, sahajaate sattarasa, a~n~nama~n~ne ekaadasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekaviisa, purejaate pa~nca, pacchaajaate pa~nca, aasevane sattarasa, kamme satta, vipaake eka.m, aahaare satta, indriye satta, jhaane satta, magge satta, sampayutte ekaadasa, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa sattarasa, natthiyaa sattarasa, vigate sattarasa, avigate sattarasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.

[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami.m dhamma.m paccayaa aacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati naaasevanapaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa aacayagaamii khandhaa. (2)

[03] apacayagaami.m dhamma.m paccayaa apacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- apacayagaamii khandhe paccayaa apacayagaamii cetanaa. (1)

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ aacayagaami.m ^a^M2.0254^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa aacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa (paripu.n.na.m kaatabba.m, pa.tisandhikkha.ne natthi).

[01] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami.m ^a^V2.0287^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii ^a^T2.0339^ea^ dhammo uppajjati naaahaarapaccayaa -- baahira.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... naindriyapaccayaa -- baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... mahaabhuute paccayaa ruupajiivitindriya.m... najhaanapaccayaa -- pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... namaggapaccayaa -- ahetukaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii...pe0... nasampayuttapaccayaa... navippayuttapaccayaa (pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m, tii.ni)... nonatthipaccayaa... novigatapaccayaa.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa cattaari, naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa dvaadasa, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare naa~n~nama~n~ne naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate sattarasa, naaasevane ekaadasa, nakamme satta, navipaake sattarasa, naaahaare naindriye najhaane namagge eka.m, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa novigate pa~nca (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa dvaadasa, naanantare ^a^T2.0340^ea^ nasamanantare naa~n~nama~n~ne ^a^V2.0288^ea^ naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate ^a^M2.0255^ea^ sattarasa, naaasevane ekaadasa, nakamme satta, navipaake sattarasa, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa novigate pa~nca (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne cattaari, anantare samanantare sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye upanissaye purejaate aasevane kamme cattaari, vipaake eka.m, aahaare cattaari, indriye jhaane cattaari, magge tii.ni, sampayutte vippayutte atthiyaa natthiyaa vigate cattaari, avigate cattaari (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] paccayavaaro.
[06] (nissayavaaro paccayavaarasadiso).

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ aacayagaami.m ^a^V2.0289^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- aacayagaami.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa. (1)
[03] apacayagaami.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho apacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- apacayagaami.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami.m ^a^T2.0341^ea^ ^a^M2.0256^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ aacayagaami.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa... adhipatipaccayaa... anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa... sahajaatapaccayaa... a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa... nissayapaccayaa... upanissayapaccayaa... purejaatapaccayaa... aasevanapaccayaa... kammapaccayaa... vipaakapaccayaa... aahaarapaccayaa... indriyapaccayaa... jhaanapaccayaa... maggapaccayaa... sampayuttapaccayaa... vippayuttapaccayaa... atthipaccayaa... natthipaccayaa... vigatapaccayaa... avigatapaccayaa.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V2.0290^ea^ tii.ni, aaramma.ne adhipatiyaa anantare samanantare sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye upanissaye purejaate aasevane kamme sabbattha tii.ni, vipaake eka.m, aahaare tii.ni, indriye jhaane magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyaa natthiyaa vigate avigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ aacayagaami.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe sa.msa.t.tho vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)

[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii ^a^T2.0342^ea^ dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ aacayagaami.m ^a^M2.0257^ea^ ^a^V2.0291^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa... napurejaatapaccayaa... napacchaajaatapaccayaa... naaasevanapaccayaa... aacayagaami.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0....

[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo uppajjati naaasevanapaccayaa -- nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... nakammapaccayaa... navipaakapaccayaa... najhaanapaccayaa... namaggapaccayaa... navippayuttapaccayaa.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa dve, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane dve, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane dve, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, navippayutte tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0292^ea^ aaramma.ne dve, anantare samanantare sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye upanissaye purejaate aasevane kamme ^a^T2.0343^ea^ ^a^M2.0258^ea^ sabbattha dve, vipaake eka.m, aahaare dve, indriye dve, jhaane dve, magge eka.m, sampayutte dve, vippayutte atthiyaa natthiyaa vigate avigate dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] sa.msa.t.thavaaro.
[06] (sampayuttavaaro sa.msa.t.thavaarasadiso.)

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ aacayagaamii {aacayagaami (sii0 syaa0) evamuparipi} dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aacayagaamii hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] aacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aacayagaamii hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aacayagaamii ^a^V2.0293^ea^ dhammo aacayagaamissa ca nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aacayagaamii hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] apacayagaamii dhammo apacayagaamissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa ^a^T2.0344^ea^ dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ aacayagaamii ^a^M2.0259^ea^ dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati. sekkhaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa aacayagaamii khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, cetopariya~naa.nena aacayagaamicittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti, aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakusalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusalassa...pe0... aacayagaamii khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhati, pubbe ^a^T2.0345^ea^ samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaanaati, aacayagaamii khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; cetopariya~naa.nena aacayagaamicittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati ^a^V2.0294^ea^. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa aacayagaamii khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati, aacayagaamii khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati, aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanavipaakassa ca kiriyassa ca aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanavipaakassa ca kiriyassa ca aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aacayagaamii khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ apacayagaamii dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, cetopariya~naa.nena apacayagaamicittasama"ngissa ^a^M2.0260^ea^ citta.m jaananti, apacayagaamii khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] apacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhati ^a^T2.0346^ea^, cetopariya~naa.nena apacayagaamicittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, apacayagaamii khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa phala.m paccavekkhati, nibbaana.m paccavekkhati, nibbaana.m phalassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. arahaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m... nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamicittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatanakiriya.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakiriya.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriyassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii khandhaa ^a^V2.0295^ea^ iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0347^ea^. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m... nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m...pe0... dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passanti, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.nanti, cetopariya~naa.nena ^a^M2.0261^ea^ nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamicittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti, nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo apacayagaamissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ aacayagaamii dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, aacayagaamii khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aacayagaamii adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ^a^T2.0348^ea^ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ ^a^V2.0296^ea^ -- aacayagaamii adhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aacayagaamii dhammo aacayagaamissa ca nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aacayagaamii adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ apacayagaamii dhammo apacayagaamissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- apacayagaamii adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] apacayagaamii dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sekkhaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. (2)

(1)

[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] 62^b^.^eb^ nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii ^a^T2.0358^ea^ eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vipaakapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ aacayagaamii dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ aacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^V2.0304^ea^ -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aacayagaamii khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aacayagaamii khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] apacayagaamii ^a^M2.0269^ea^ dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- apacayagaamii khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- apacayagaamii khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0359^ea^. khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamiina.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa...pe0.... (1)
[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu aacayagaamiina.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo apacayagaamissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu apacayagaamiina.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ aacayagaamii dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- aacayagaamii eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0.... (1)

[03] aacayagaamii ^a^V2.0305^ea^ dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aacayagaamii khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aacayagaamii khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aacayagaamii ^a^M2.0270^ea^ dhammo aacayagaamissa ca nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- aacayagaamii eko khandho ^a^T2.0360^ea^ ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0.... (3)
[03] apacayagaamii dhammo... tii.ni (aacayagaaminayena kaatabba.m).

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- arahaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamiina.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa...pe0... ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m...pe0.... (1)

[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo aacayagaamissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato ^a^T2.0361^ea^ dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m ^a^V2.0306^ea^ aniccato...pe0... vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, vatthu aacayagaamiina.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii dhammo apacayagaamissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu apacayagaamiina.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ aacayagaamii ^a^M2.0271^ea^ ca nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii ca dhammaa aacayagaamissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- aacayagaamii eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0.... (1)

[03] aacayagaamii ca nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii ca dhammaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aacayagaamii khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aacayagaamii khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aacayagaamii khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] apacayagaamii ca nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii ca dhammaa apacayagaamissa ^a^T2.0362^ea^ dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (dve kaatabbaa dassitanayena), natthipaccayena paccayo, vigatapaccayena paccayo, avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V2.0309^ea^ pannarasa, naaaramma.ne naadhipatiyaa naanantare nasamanantare pannarasa, nasahajaate ekaadasa, naa~n~nama~n~ne ekaadasa, nanissaye ekaadasa, naupanissaye cuddasa, napurejaate terasa, napacchaajaate pannarasa, naaasevane nakamme navipaake naaahaare naindriye najhaane namagge pannarasa, nasampayutte ekaadasa, navippayutte nava, noatthiyaa nava, nonatthiyaa pannarasa, novigate pannarasa, noavigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[01] nevasekkhanaasekkha.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa (paripu.n.na.m, eka.m).

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ sekkha.m ^a^M2.0289^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho sekkho dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa... napacchaajaatapaccayaa... naaasevanapaccayaa... nakammapaccayaa (dve kaatabbaa)... navipaakapaccayaa (dve kaatabbaa)... najhaanapaccayaa... namaggapaccayaa... navippayuttapaccayaa...pe0....

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane tii.ni, nakamme dve, navipaake dve, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate naaasevane tii.ni, nakamme dve, navipaake dve, navippayutte tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0330^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare samanantare sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye upanissaye purejaate aasevane kamme vipaake aahaare indriye jhaane magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyaa ^a^T2.0382^ea^ natthiyaa vigate avigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] sa.msa.t.thavaaro.
[06] (sampayuttavaaro sa.msa.t.thavaarasadiso.)
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ sekkho ^a^M2.0290^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sekkho ^a^V2.0331^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanaasekkhassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa (tii.ni).

[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- nevasekkhanaasekkhaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, sekkha.m phala.m paccavekkhanti, cetopariya~naa.nena sekkhacittasama"ngissa ^a^T2.0383^ea^ citta.m jaananti, sekkhaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa asekkha.m phala.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.nena asekkhacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, asekkhaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^M2.0291^ea^ dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m nevasekkhanaasekkhe ^a^V2.0332^ea^ khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena nevasekkhanaasekkhacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^T2.0384^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... nevasekkhanaasekkhaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa, sekkhassa phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m asekkhassa phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 45^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sekkhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, sekkha.m phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti ^a^M2.0292^ea^. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sekkhaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sekkho ^a^T2.0385^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanaasekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sekkhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 46^b^.^eb^ asekkho ^a^V2.0333^ea^ dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- asekkhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- arahaa asekkha.m phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- asekkhaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanaasekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- asekkhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa ^a^T2.0386^ea^ jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, ariyaa nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m nevasekkhanaasekkhe khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nevasekkhanaasekkhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m maggassa, sekkhassa phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^M2.0293^ea^ dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m asekkhassa phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ sekkho ^a^V2.0334^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa sekkhaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sekkhaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. maggo sekkhassa phalassa... sekkha.m phala.m sekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. [03] sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- maggo asekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa asekkhaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m asekkhaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. asekkha.m phala.m asekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- asekkha.m phala.m vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nevasekkhanaasekkhaana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... aavajjanaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa... anuloma.m sekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusala.m sekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^M2.0294^ea^ ^a^V2.0335^ea^ dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- anuloma.m asekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa ^a^T2.0388^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriya.m asekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 51^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0... (anantarasadisa.m, a.t.tha pa~nhaa).

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... (pa.ticcavaare sahajaatasadisa.m, nava pa~nhaa) a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcavaare a~n~nama~n~nasadisa.m, tii.ni. nissayapaccaye kusalattike nissayapaccayasadisa.m, terasa pa~nhaa).

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. dutiyo maggo tatiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. maggo sekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- maggo asekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccaya -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- ariyaa magga.m ^a^V2.0336^ea^ upanissaaya anuppanna.m kusalasamaapatti.m ^a^T2.0389^ea^ uppaadenti, uppanna.m samaapajjanti, sa"nkhaare aniccato...pe0... vipassanti, maggo ariyaana.m atthappa.tisambhidaaya...pe0... pa.tibhaanappa.tisambhidaaya... .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa ^a^M2.0295^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. sekkhaa phalasamaapattiyaa kaayikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^anantaruupanissayo^eb^ -- purimaa purimaa asekkhaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m asekkhaana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... asekkha.m phala.m asekkhassa phalassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- asekkhaa phalasamaapatti kaayikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- nevasekkhanaasekkha.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti. siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... jhaana.m...pe0... vipassana.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. nevasekkhanaasekkha.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. nevasekkhanaasekkhaa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa, kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0390^ea^ senaasana.m nevasekkhanaasekkhaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. pa.thamassa jhaanassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa jhaanassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa parikamma.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m dutiyassa jhaanassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ ^a^V2.0337^ea^, ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamassa maggassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... catutthassa maggassa parikamma.m catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^M2.0296^ea^ dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m asekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato ^a^T2.0391^ea^ anattato vipassati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa, vatthu nevasekkhanaasekkhaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sekkhaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu asekkhaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ sekkho ^a^V2.0338^ea^ dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa sekkhaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa asekkhaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^M2.0297^ea^ dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa ^a^T2.0392^ea^ khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nevasekkhanaasekkhaana.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. [03] 59^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sekkhaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- sekkhaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m sekkhaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sekkho ^a^V2.0339^ea^ dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- sekkhaa cetanaa asekkhaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sekkhaa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanaasekkhassa ca dhammassa ^a^T2.0393^ea^ kammapaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (4)
[03] 60^b^.^eb^ asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- asekkhaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] asekkho ^a^M2.0298^ea^ dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- asekkhaa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanaasekkhassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- asekkhaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nevasekkhanaasekkhaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- nevasekkhanaasekkhaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m nevasekkhanaasekkhaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 62^b^.^eb^ sekkho ^a^V2.0340^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako sekkho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... (sekkhamuulake tii.ni ).
[03] asekkho ^a^T2.0394^ea^ dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- asekkho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... (asekkhamuulake tii.ni).

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0....

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ sekkho ^a^M2.0299^ea^ dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sekkhaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sekkhaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo (1).
[03] asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sekkhasadisa.m).

[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m ^a^V2.0341^ea^, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nevasekkhanaasekkhaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne nevasekkhanaasekkhaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m ^a^T2.0395^ea^ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa, vatthu nevasekkhanaasekkhaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nevasekkhanaasekkhaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sekkhaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu asekkhaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sekkho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0.... (1)

[03] sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sekkhaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sekkhaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] sekkho ^a^M2.0300^ea^ dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanaasekkhassa ca dhammassa ^a^T2.0396^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo -- sekkho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0.... (3)
[03] asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... tii.ni (sekkhasadisa.m).

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^V2.0342^ea^ dhammo nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nevasekkhanaasekkho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu nevasekkhanaasekkhaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nevasekkhanaasekkhaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ^a^T2.0397^ea^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sekkhaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] nevasekkhanaasekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu asekkhaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ sekkho ca nevasekkhanaasekkho ca dhammaa sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- sekkho ^a^M2.0301^ea^ eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0.... (1)

[03] sekkho ca nevasekkhanaasekkho ca dhammaa nevasekkhanaasekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sekkhaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sekkhaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro ^a^V2.0343^ea^ aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sekkhaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] asekkho ca nevasekkhanaasekkho ca dhammaa asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... (dve pa~nhaa kaatabbaa, sekkhasadisaa).

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T2.0400^ea^ cuddasa, naaaramma.ne naadhipatiyaa naanantare nasamanantare cuddasa, nasahajaate dasa, naa~n~nama~n~ne dasa, nanissaye dasa ^a^M2.0303^ea^, naupanissaye terasa, napurejaate dvaadasa, napacchaajaate cuddasa, naaasevane nakamme cuddasa, navipaake dvaadasa, naaahaare naindriye najhaane namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte dasa, navippayutte a.t.tha, noatthiyaa a.t.tha, nonatthiyaa cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate a.t.tha (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne satta, naadhipatiyaa satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme satta, navipaake cattaari, naaahaare naindriye najhaane namagge satta, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa satta, novigate satta (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ paritta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paritto dhammo uppajjati anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa... sahajaatapaccayaa (sabbepi mahaabhuutaa kaatabbaa)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa... nissayapaccayaa... upanissayapaccayaa ^a^V2.0351^ea^... purejaatapaccayaa (tisso ^a^M2.0307^ea^ pa~nhaa kaatabbaa)... aasevanapaccayaa (tisso pa~nhaa kaatabbaa)... kammapaccayaa... vipaakapaccayaa (terasa pa~nhaa)... aahaarapaccayaa... indriyapaccayaa... jhaanapaccayaa... maggapaccayaa,... sampayuttapaccayaa... vippayuttapaccayaa... atthipaccayaa... natthipaccayaa... vigatapaccayaa... avigatapaccayaa.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa terasa, aaramma.ne pa~nca, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare pa~nca, samanantare pa~nca, sahajaate terasa, a~n~nama~n~ne satta, nissaye terasa, upanissaye pa~nca, purejaate tii.ni, aasevane tii.ni, kamme terasa, vipaake terasa, aahaare indriye jhaane magge terasa, sampayutte pa~nca, vippayutte terasa, atthiyaa terasa, natthiyaa pa~nca, vigate pa~nca, avigate terasa.
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ paritto dhammo parittassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, ariyaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti, pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... paritte khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassanti assaadenti abhinandanti, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati ^a^V2.0373^ea^ ...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] paritto ^a^M2.0324^ea^ dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena parittacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. parittaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] 57^b^.^eb^ mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cetopariya~naa.nena mahaggatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0427^ea^. mahaggataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] mahaggato dhammo parittassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- pa.thama.m jhaana.m paccavekkhati...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m cakkhu.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m sotadhaatu.m paccavekkhati, iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, anaagata.msa~naa.na.m paccavekkhati. mahaggate khandhe aniccato...pe0... vippassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. (2)
[03] 58^b^.^eb^ appamaa.no dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa, phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appamaa.no ^a^V2.0374^ea^ dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa cetopariya~naa.nena appamaa.nacittasama"ngissa ^a^T2.0428^ea^ citta.m jaananti, appamaa.naa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] 59^b^.^eb^ paritto ^a^M2.0325^ea^ dhammo parittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... paritte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- parittaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] mahaggato dhammo mahaggatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- mahaggataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

(1)

(3)

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ appamaa.no ^a^M2.0333^ea^ dhammo appamaa.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- appamaa.na.m saddha.m upanissaaya appamaa.na.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, phalasamaapatti.m uppaadeti. appamaa.na.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m upanissaaya appamaa.na.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, phalasamaapatti.m uppaadeti. appamaa.naa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa appamaa.naaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. pa.thamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa...pe0... tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa... maggo phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 17^b^.^eb^ parittaaramma.no dhammo parittaaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, parittaaramma.ne paritte ^a^M2.0350^ea^ khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m ^a^T2.0462^ea^ katvaa parittaaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- parittaaramma.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] parittaaramma.no dhammo mahaggataaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- dibba.m cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, dibba.m sotadhaatu.m...pe0... parittaaramma.na.m iddhividha~naa.na.m...pe0... cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. parittaaramma.ne mahaggate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa mahaggataaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. [03] 18^b^.^eb^ mahaggataaramma.no dhammo mahaggataaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m...pe0... mahaggataaramma.na.m iddhividha~naa.na.m...pe0... cetopariya~naa.na.m ^a^V2.0404^ea^ ...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. mahaggataaramma.ne mahaggate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa mahaggataaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- mahaggataaramma.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] mahaggataaramma.no dhammo parittaaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- pa.thamajjhaanapaccavekkha.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.napaccavekkha.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. mahaggataaramma.ne ^a^T2.0463^ea^ paritte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa parittaaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ appamaa.naaramma.no dhammo appamaa.naaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- appamaa.naaramma.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appamaa.naaramma.no ^a^M2.0351^ea^ dhammo parittaaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, maggapaccavekkha.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phalapaccavekkha.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaanapaccavekkha.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. (2)

[03] appamaa.naaramma.no dhammo mahaggataaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sekkhaa appamaa.naaramma.na.m cetopariya~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. (3)

[03] aniyata.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aniyato dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe aniyata.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] micchattaniyata.m ^a^V2.0429^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati napacchaajaatapaccayaa (paripu.n.na.m).

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ aniyata.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aniyato dhammo uppajjati naaasevanapaccayaa -- aniyata.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] micchattaniyata.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa, navipaakapaccayaa (sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] aniyata.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aniyato dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa -- pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... namaggapaccayaa -- ahetuka.m aniyata.m...pe0....

[03] sammattaniyata.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayaa -- aruupe sammattaniyata.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
[03] aniyata.m ^a^T2.0487^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aniyato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayaa -- aruupe aniyata.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate dve, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane eka.m, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M2.0371^ea^ ^a^V2.0430^ea^ naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate dve, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane eka.m, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, navippayutte dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.
[03] 35^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m (sa.mkhitta.m), avigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] sa.msa.t.thavaaro.
[06] (sampayuttavaaro sa.msa.t.thavaarasadiso).
[03] 36^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato ^a^V2.0431^ea^ dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- micchattaniyataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0488^ea^ -- micchattaniyataa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- micchattaniyataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] sammattaniyato ^a^M2.0372^ea^ dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aniyataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa micchattaniyate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. micchattaniyate khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassanti. cetopariya~naa.nena micchattaniyatacittasama"ngissa ^a^V2.0432^ea^ citta.m jaananti. micchattaniyataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti. cetopariya~naa.nena sammattaniyatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. sammattaniyataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa ^a^T2.0489^ea^, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ariyaa aniyate pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti. pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... aniyate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti, ta.m aarabbha aniyato raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena ^a^M2.0373^ea^ aniyatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aniyataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ruupajiivitindriya.m maatughaatikammassa... pitughaatikammassa... arahantaghaatikammassa... ^a^T2.0490^ea^ ruhiruppaadakammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ya.m vatthu.m paraamasantassa micchattaniyataa khandhaa uppajjanti, ta.m vatthu micchattaniyataana.m khandhaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] aniyato ^a^V2.0433^ea^ dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- micchattaniyataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- micchattaniyataadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- micchattaniyataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sammattaniyataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sammattaniyato ^a^M2.0374^ea^ dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa ^a^T2.0491^ea^ maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sammattaniyataadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sammattaniyataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati ^a^V2.0434^ea^ sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0... aniyate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa aniyato raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aniyataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m maggassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- micchattaniyataa khandhaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena ^a^T2.0492^ea^ paccayo. (1)
[03] sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- maggo phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa aniyataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aniyataana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ aniyato ^a^M2.0375^ea^ dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- aniyata.m domanassa.m micchattaniyatassa domanassassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. aniyatamicchaadi.t.thi niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] aniyato ^a^V2.0435^ea^ dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisa.m)... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m, nava pa~nhaa)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m, tisso pa~nhaa)... nissayapaccayena paccayo (kusalattikasadisaa, terasa ^a^T2.0493^ea^ pa~nhaa).

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- maatughaatikamma.m maatughaatikammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. maatughaatikamma.m...pe0... pitughaatikamma.m...pe0... arahantaghaatikamma.m...pe0... ruhiruppaadakamma.m...pe0... sa"nghabhedakamma.m...pe0... niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (cakka.m kaatabba.m). niyatamicchaadi.t.thi niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. niyatamicchaadi.t.thi maatughaatikammassa...pe0... sa"nghabhedakammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- maatara.m jiivitaa voropetvaa tassa pa.tighaatatthaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. pitara.m jiivitaa voropetvaa...pe0... arahanta.m jiivitaa voropetvaa...pe0... du.t.thena cittena tathaagatassa lohita.m uppaadetvaa...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhinditvaa tassa pa.tighaatatthaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. (2)

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ sammattaniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- pa.thamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena ^a^M2.0376^ea^ paccayo...pe0... tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sammattaniyato ^a^V2.0436^ea^ dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena ^a^T2.0494^ea^ paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- ariyaa magga.m upanissaaya anuppanna.m samaapatti.m uppaadenti, uppanna.m samaapajjanti, sa"nkhaare aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti. maggo ariyaana.m atthappa.tisambhidaaya...pe0... .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. maggo phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- aniyata.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m...pe0... jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m... abhi~n~na.m... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. aniyata.m siila.m... suta.m... caaga.m... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... nigamaghaata.m karoti. aniyataa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... senaasana.m aniyataaya saddhaaya...pe0... kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. pa.thamassa jhaanassa parikamma.m tasseva...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa parikamma.m tasseva...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m dutiyassa jhaanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... paa.naatipaato paa.naatipaatassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (cakka.m kaatabba.m). (1)

[03] aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- aniyata.m ^a^T2.0495^ea^ raaga.m upanissaaya maatara.m jiivitaa voropeti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. aniyata.m dosa.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya maatara.m jiivitaa voropeti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. aniyato raago...pe0... senaasana.m maatughaatikammassa... pitughaatikammassa... arahantaghaatikammassa... ruhiruppaadakammassa... sa"nghabhedakammassa... niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aniyato ^a^M2.0377^ea^ ^a^V2.0437^ea^ dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamassa maggassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa maggassa...pe0... catutthassa maggassa parikamma.m catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha aniyato raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu aniyataana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena ^a^T2.0496^ea^ paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupajiivitindriya.m maatughaatikammassa... pitughaatikammassa... arahantaghaatikammassa... ruhiruppaadakammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu micchattaniyataana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sammattaniyataana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 49^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa micchattaniyataa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sammattaniyato ^a^V2.0438^ea^ dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa sammattaniyataa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] aniyato ^a^M2.0378^ea^ dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa aniyataa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa aniyataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aniyataana.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m ^a^T2.0497^ea^ vodaanassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- aniyata.m domanassa.m micchattaniyatassa domanassassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. aniyatamicchaadi.t.thi niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] aniyato dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 51^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- micchattaniyataa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] micchattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- micchattaniyataa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- micchattaniyataa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] micchattaniyato ^a^V2.0439^ea^ dhammo micchattaniyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- micchattaniyataa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ sammattaniyato ^a^M2.0379^ea^ dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena ^a^T2.0498^ea^ paccayo -- sammattaniyataa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sammattaniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sammattaniyataa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- sammattaniyataa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aniyataa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- aniyataa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aniyataa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu aniyataana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aniyataa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa ^a^T2.0500^ea^ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu micchattaniyataana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- micchattaniyato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
