[03] sammattaniyato ^a^M2.0381^ea^ dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... (tisso pa~nhaa).

[03] aniyato ^a^T2.0501^ea^ dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- aniyato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya ^a^V2.0442^ea^ sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu aniyataana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aniyataa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aniyato dhammo micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupajiivitindriya.m maatughaatikammassa...pe0... ruhiruppaadakammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. vatthu micchattaniyataana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] aniyato ^a^T2.0502^ea^ dhammo sammattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sammattaniyataana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammaa micchattaniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- micchattaniyato eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... (1)

[03] micchattaniyato ca aniyato ca dhammaa aniyatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- micchattaniyataa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- micchattaniyataa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca ^a^M2.0382^ea^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- micchattaniyataa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V2.0443^ea^ satta, aaramma.ne pa~nca, adhipatiyaa a.t.tha, anantare pa~nca, samanantare pa~nca, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye terasa, upanissaye satta, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane tii.ni, kamme satta, vipaake eka.m, aahaare satta, indriye satta, jhaane satta, magge satta, sampayutte ^a^T2.0503^ea^ tii.ni, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa terasa, natthiyaa pa~nca, vigate pa~nca, avigate terasa (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^T2.0532^ea^ ^a^M2.0405^ea^ ^a^V2.0472^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- uppannaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne uppannaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- uppanna.m cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. uppanna.m sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... uppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ^a^V2.0473^ea^ ...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... uppannaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anuppanne ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... anuppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati...pe0... domanassa.m ^a^T2.0533^ea^ uppajjati. anuppannaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ uppaadii dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- uppaadi.m cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... ruupe... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... uppaadii khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. uppaadii khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- uppanno eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne uppanno eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0... mahaabhuutaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0... mahaabhuutaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^M2.0407^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo -- uppanno eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne uppanno ^a^T2.0535^ea^ eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m vatthussa ca a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0.... [03] 8^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- uppanno eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m ^a^V2.0475^ea^ khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa...pe0... vatthu khandhaana.m...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuutaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu uppannaana.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^ pakatuupanissayo -- uppanna.m utu.m upanissaaya jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m...pe0... magga.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. uppanna.m bhojana.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya jhaana.m uppaadeti vipassana.m...pe0... magga.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. uppanna.m utu... ^a^T2.0536^ea^ bhojana.m... senaasana.m uppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- anuppanna.m ^a^M2.0408^ea^ va.n.nasampada.m patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. anuppanna.m saddasampada.m... gandhasampada.m... rasasampada.m... pho.t.thabbasampada.m... anuppanne khandhe patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. anuppannaa va.n.nasampadaa...pe0... anuppannaa khandhaa uppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] uppaadii dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- uppaadi.m cakkhusampada.m patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. uppaadi.m sotasampada.m...pe0... kaayasampada.m...pe0... va.n.nasampada.m ^a^V2.0476^ea^... gandhasampada.m... rasasampada.m... pho.t.thabbasampada.m... uppaadii khandhe patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. uppaadii cakkhusampadaa...pe0... kaayasampadaa... va.n.nasampadaa...pe0... pho.t.thabbasampadaa... uppaadii khandhaa uppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa ^a^T2.0537^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu uppannaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa uppannaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^M2.0409^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- uppannaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne uppannaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^V2.0477^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako uppanno eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^T2.0538^ea^ uppanno eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vipaakapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- uppannaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- uppannaa indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ruupajiivitindriya.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- uppannaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne uppannaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa, vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ^a^M2.0410^ea^ ...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu uppannaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- uppannaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena ^a^T2.0539^ea^ paccayo. (1)

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^V2.0478^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- uppanno eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotudhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu uppannaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- uppannaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo...pe0....

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa eka.m, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, sahajaate eka.m, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye eka.m, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate eka.m, pacchaajaate kamme vipaake aahaare indriye jhaane magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyaa avigate eka.m (eva.m ^a^T2.0540^ea^ ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ uppanno ^a^M2.0411^ea^ ^a^V2.0479^ea^ dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] uppaadii dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 21^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa tii.ni, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni...pe0... navippayutte tii.ni, noatthiyaa dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni, noavigate dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[03] 22^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne eka.m...pe0... nonatthiyaa novigate eka.m.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0480^ea^ aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, sahajaate eka.m, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye eka.m, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate eka.m, pacchaajaate eka.m, kamme vipaake aahaare indriye jhaane ^a^T2.0541^ea^ magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyaa avigate eka.m.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] uppannattika.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno ^a^M2.0412^ea^ ^a^V2.0481^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- paccuppannaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m...pe0... paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati. ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. atiita.m cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. atiita.m sota.m...pe0... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... atiite khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato ^a^V2.0482^ea^ vipassati ^a^T2.0542^ea^, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa... uddhacca.m... domanassa.m uppajjati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. atiitaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ anaagato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anaagata.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... anaagate khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. anaagataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- paccuppanna.m cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... paccuppanne ^a^M2.0413^ea^ khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... paccuppannaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0543^ea^. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa...pe0... pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. atiita.m cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... atiite khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1) anaagato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- anaagata.m ^a^V2.0483^ea^ cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... anaagate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

[03] paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- paccuppanna.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... paccuppanne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- paccuppannaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa atiitaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m paccuppannaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m ^a^T2.0544^ea^ vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa... maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ atiito ^a^M2.0414^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisa.m). (1)
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ atiito ^a^V2.0484^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena ^a^T2.0545^ea^ paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- atiita.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m... magga.m... abhi~n~na.m... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. atiita.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. atiitaa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa, kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... paccuppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anaagato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- anaagata.m cakkhusampada.m patthayamaano...pe0... sotasampada.m... ghaanasampada.m jivhaasampada.m... kaayasampada.m... va.n.nasampada.m... saddasampada.m... gandhasampada.m... rasasampada.m... pho.t.thabbasampada.m...patthayamaano...pe0... anaagate khandhe patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m... anaagataa cakkhusampadaa...pe0... va.n.nasampadaa...pe0... pho.t.thabbasampadaa... anaagataa khandhaa paccuppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- paccuppanna.m ^a^M2.0415^ea^ utu.m upanissaaya jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m...pe0... paccuppanna.m bhojana.m senaasana.m upanissaaya jhaana.m uppaadeti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti. paccuppanna.m utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m paccuppannaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya kaayikassa...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno ^a^V2.0485^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena ^a^T2.0546^ea^ paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu paccuppannaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 10^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa paccuppannaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa atiitaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m paccuppannaana.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- atiitaa cetanaa paccuppannaana.m vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] paccuppanno ^a^M2.0416^ea^ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- paccuppannaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m ^a^V2.0486^ea^ khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne paccuppannaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena ^a^T2.0547^ea^ paccayo -- vipaako paccuppano eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vipaakapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- paccuppannaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne paccuppannaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu paccuppannaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- paccuppannaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (uppannattike atthisadisa.m). (1)
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo.
[03] paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena ^a^T2.0548^ea^ paccayo...pe0....

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M2.0417^ea^ ^a^V2.0487^ea^ eka.m, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye eka.m, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate pacchaajaate aasevane eka.m, kamme dve, vipaake aahaare eka.m...pe0... avigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ atiito dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] anaagato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa tii.ni, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni ^a^V2.0488^ea^ ...pe0... nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte tii.ni, noatthiyaa dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni, noavigate dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^T2.0549^ea^ ^a^M2.0418^ea^ naaaramma.ne eka.m, naadhipatiyaa naanantare nasamanantare naa~n~nama~n~ne naupanissaye...pe0... nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyaa novigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, anantare samanantare sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye eka.m, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate eka.m, pacchaajaate aasevane eka.m...pe0... kamme dve, vipaake eka.m (imesu padesu eka.myeva), avigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] pa~nhaavaaro.
[06] atiitattika.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^T2.0550^ea^ ^a^M2.0419^ea^ ^a^V2.0489^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. (1)
[03] 2^b^.^eb^ anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- anaagataaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- paccuppannaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhaa. pa.tisandhikkha.ne paccuppannaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^V2.0490^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa... adhipatipaccayaa (adhipatiyaa pa.tisandhi natthi)... anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa... sahajaatapaccayaa... a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa... nissayapaccayaa... upanissayapaccayaa... purejaatapaccayaa... aasevanapaccayaa (purejaatepi aasevanepi pa.tisandhi natthi)... kammapaccayaa... ^a^T2.0551^ea^ vipaakapaccayaa (vipaaka.m atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m, tissopi pa~nhaa paripu.n.naa. pavattipa.tisandhi kaatabbaa)... aahaarapaccayaa... indriyapaccayaa... jhaanapaccayaa... maggapaccayaa... sampayuttapaccayaa... vippayuttapaccayaa... atthipaccayaa... natthipaccayaa... vigatapaccayaa... avigatapaccayaa.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni...pe0... (sabbattha tii.ni), vigate tii.ni, avigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^M2.0420^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^V2.0491^ea^ ...pe0... vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m anaagataaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m paccuppannaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m ^a^T2.0552^ea^ pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa (anulomasahajaatasadisa.m).

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe anaagataaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne paccuppannaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^M2.0421^ea^ ^a^V2.0492^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati napacchaajaatapaccayaa... naaasevanapaccayaa (naadhipatisadisaa)... nakammapaccayaa -- atiitaaramma.ne khandhe pa.ticca atiitaaramma.naa cetanaa. (1)
[03] anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- anaagataaramma.ne khandhe pa.ticca anaagataaramma.naa ^a^T2.0553^ea^ cetanaa. (1)
[03] paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- paccuppannaaramma.ne khandhe pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.naa cetanaa. (1)
[03] 12^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa...pe0... (navipaake pa.tisandhi natthi).

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ paccuppannaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa -- pa~ncavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayaa -- ahetuka.m atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... (nahetusadisaa tisso pa~nhaa, moho natthi ).

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.na.m ^a^V2.0493^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca atiitaaramma.no dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayaa -- aruupe atiitaaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] anaagataaramma.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anaagataaramma.no dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayaa -- aruupe anaagataaramma.na.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^M2.0422^ea^ tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake tii.ni, najhaane eka.m, namagge tii.ni, navippayutte ^a^T2.0554^ea^ dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[03] 17^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate napacchaajaate naaasevane nakamme navipaake tii.ni, navippayutte dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V2.0494^ea^ aaramma.ne tii.ni...pe0... (sabbattha tii.ni) avigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] pa.ticcavaaro.
[03] (sahajaatavaaropi paccayavaaropi nissayavaaropi sa.msa.t.thavaaropi sampayuttavaaropi pa.ticcavaarasadisaa.)

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.no dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- atiitaaramma.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena ^a^M2.0423^ea^ paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne atiitaaramma.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] anaagataaramma.no dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anaagataaramma.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] paccuppannaaramma.no ^a^T2.0555^ea^ dhammo paccuppannaaramma.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- paccuppannaaramma.naa ^a^V2.0495^ea^ hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne paccuppannaaramma.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.no dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- atiita.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.na.m atiita.m iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m paccavekkhati. ariyaa atiitaaramma.ne pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. atiitaaramma.ne atiite khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha atiitaaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. atiitaaramma.naa atiitaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] atiitaaramma.no dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anaagata.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.na.m anaagata.m iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.ne anaagate khandhe aniccato...pe0... ^a^T2.0556^ea^ vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha anaagataaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. atiitaaramma.naa anaagataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] atiitaaramma.no ^a^M2.0424^ea^ dhammo paccuppannaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cetopariya~naa.nena atiitaaramma.napaccuppannacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. atiitaaramma.naa paccuppannaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ anaagataaramma.no ^a^V2.0496^ea^ dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anaagataaramma.na.m anaagata.m iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagataaramma.ne anaagate khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha anaagataaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. anaagataaramma.naa anaagataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anaagataaramma.no dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anaagataaramma.na.m atiita.m iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m...pe0... ariyaa anaagataaramma.ne pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti. pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. anaagataaramma.ne atiite khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati ^a^T2.0557^ea^, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha atiitaaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. anaagataaramma.naa atiitaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anaagataaramma.no dhammo paccuppannaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cetopariya~naa.nena anaagataaramma.napaccuppannacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. anaagataaramma.naa paccuppannaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo paccuppannaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cetopariya~naa.nena paccuppannaaramma.napaccuppannacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. paccuppannaaramma.naa paccuppannaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] paccuppannaaramma.no ^a^M2.0425^ea^ dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- atiita.m dibba.m cakkhu.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m sotadhaatu.m paccavekkhati, paccuppannaaramma.na.m atiita.m iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m paccavekkhati. ariyaa paccuppannaaramma.ne pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti ^a^V2.0497^ea^. paccuppannaaramma.ne atiite khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati ^a^T2.0558^ea^; ta.m aarabbha atiitaaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. paccuppannaaramma.naa atiitaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] paccuppannaaramma.no dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- anaagata.m dibba.m cakkhu.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m sotadhaatu.m paccavekkhati, paccuppannaaramma.na.m anaagata.m iddhividha~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... paccuppannaaramma.ne anaagate khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati...pe0... ta.m aarabbha anaagataaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. paccuppannaaramma.naa anaagataa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ atiitaaramma.no dhammo atiitaaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- atiita.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.na.m atiita.m iddhividha~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. atiitaaramma.ne atiite khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa atiitaaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati ^a^T2.0559^ea^. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- atiitaaramma.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] atiitaaramma.no dhammo anaagataaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- anaagata.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m ^a^M2.0426^ea^ ...pe0... atiitaaramma.na.m anaagata.m iddhividha~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m...pe0... atiitaaramma.ne anaagate khandhe garu.m ^a^V2.0498^ea^ katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa anaagataaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa ^a^T2.0580^ea^ maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... ruupe...pe0... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... ajjhatte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotudhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ajjhattaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] bahiddhaa dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. bahiddhaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... bahiddhaa khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m ^a^T2.0582^ea^ uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena bahiddhaa cittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. bahiddhaa ruupaayatana.m ^a^V2.0519^ea^ ajjhatta.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana.m ajjhatta.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... bahiddhaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa, ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... ajjhatte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m ^a^M2.0444^ea^ garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- ajjhattaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- paro ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... ajjhatte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaa ^a^T2.0583^ea^ dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- paro daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa, ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... phala.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. bahiddhaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... bahiddhaa khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ ^a^V2.0520^ea^ -- bahiddhaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] bahiddhaa dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo. bahiddhaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... bahiddhaa khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti, abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago...pe0... di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa ajjhattaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa, anuloma.m vodaanassa, gotrabhu maggassa, vodaana.m maggassa, maggo phalassa, phala.m phalassa, anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa, nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa ^a^T2.0584^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] bahiddhaa ^a^M2.0445^ea^ dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (purimaa purimaa bahiddhaati naanaakara.na.m, ta.myeva gamana.m). (1)

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0... (anantarasadisa.m)... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- ajjhatta.m saddha.m ^a^V2.0521^ea^ upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m...pe0... jhaana.m...pe0... vipassana.m...pe0... magga.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. ajjhatta.m siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. ajjhattaa saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa, kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... senaasana.m ajjhattaaya saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- paro ajjhatta.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati ^a^T2.0585^ea^. paro ajjhatta.m siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. ajjhattaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m bahiddhaa saddhaaya...pe0... maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- paro bahiddhaa saddha.m...pe0... patthana.m, kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m ^a^M2.0446^ea^ upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati bahiddhaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m bahiddhaa saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] bahiddhaa dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- bahiddhaa saddha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. bahiddhaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m ajjhattaaya saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto ^a^V2.0522^ea^ dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ^a^T2.0586^ea^ kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- paro ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana.m bahiddhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ajjhatta.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m bahiddhaa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- paro bahiddhaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. bahiddhaa ruupaayatana.m bahiddhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana.m bahiddhaa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- bahiddhaa cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu bahiddhaa khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] bahiddhaa ^a^M2.0447^ea^ dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- bahiddhaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. bahiddhaa ruupaayatana.m ajjhattassa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana.m ajjhattassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena ^a^T2.0587^ea^ paccayo. (2)

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto ^a^V2.0523^ea^ ca bahiddhaa ca dhammaa ajjhattassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. bahiddhaa ruupaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m cakkhaayatana~nca ajjhattassa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m kaayaayatana~nca ajjhattassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... bahiddhaa ruupaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m vatthu ca...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m vatthu ca ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ajjhatto ca bahiddhaa ca dhammaa bahiddhaa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana~nca bahiddhaa cakkhaayatana~nca bahiddhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... ajjhatta.m pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca bahiddhaa kaayaayatana~nca bahiddhaa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana~nca bahiddhaa vatthu ca...pe0... ajjhatta.m pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca bahiddhaa vatthu ca bahiddhaa khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa ajjhattaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0588^ea^ -- pacchaajaataa bahiddhaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa ajjhattaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena ^a^M2.0448^ea^ paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] bahiddhaa ^a^V2.0524^ea^ dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa...pe0... (ajjhattasadisa.myeva).

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- ajjhattaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- ajjhattaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- bahiddhaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- bahiddhaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m bahiddhaa khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena ^a^T2.0589^ea^ paccayo...pe0... (paripu.n.na.m, pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m).

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- ajjhattaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... ajjhatto kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ajjhattassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- ajjhatto kaba.liikaaro aahaaro bahiddhaa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] bahiddhaa ^a^M2.0449^ea^ ^a^V2.0525^ea^ dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo (pavattipa.tisandhi) bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro bahiddhaa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] bahiddhaa dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ajjhattassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- ajjhatto kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca ajjhattassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammassa ^a^T2.0590^ea^ aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- ajjhatto kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo, ajjhattikaa indriyaa (ruupajiivitindriyampi vitthaaretabba.m)... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (maatikaapadaani anumajjantena vitthaaretabbaani).
[03] bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- ajjhatto eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa ^a^V2.0526^ea^ ...pe0... vatthu khandhaana.m...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m (purejaatasadisa.m), vatthu ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ajjhattaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa ^a^M2.0450^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo. ajjhatto ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ ajjhattassa kaayassa...pe0... ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m...pe0.... (1)

[03] ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0591^ea^ -- purejaata.m, aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- paro ajjhatta.m cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m bahiddhaa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ajjhatto ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ bahiddhaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaa dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (bahiddhaa ninnaanaakara.na.m, maatikaapadaani vitthaaretabbaani). (1)

[03] bahiddhaa dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- purejaata.m, aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- bahiddhaa cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0... dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, bahiddhaa ruupaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m ajjhattassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. bahiddhaa ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ ajjhattassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- purejaata.m, aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- bahiddhaa ruupaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m cakkhu ca ajjhattassa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m kaayaayatana~nca ajjhattassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. bahiddhaa ruupaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m vatthu ca...pe0... bahiddhaa pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca ajjhatta.m vatthu ^a^T2.0592^ea^ ca ajjhattaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aahaara.m^eb^ -- ajjhatto kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca ajjhattassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ajjhatto ^a^V2.0527^ea^ dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- purejaata.m, aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana~nca bahiddhaa cakkhaayatana~nca bahiddhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... ajjhatta.m ^a^M2.0451^ea^ pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca bahiddhaa kaayaayatana~nca bahiddhaa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ajjhatta.m ruupaayatana~nca bahiddhaa vatthu ca bahiddhaa khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... ajjhatta.m pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca bahiddhaa vatthu ca bahiddhaa khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aahaara.m^eb^ -- ajjhatto kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca bahiddhaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa dve, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajaate a~n~nama~n~ne nissaye dve, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate cha, pacchaajaate aasevane kamme vipaake dve, aahaare cha, indriye dve, jhaane magge sampayutte vippayutte dve, atthiyaa cha, natthiyaa dve, vigate dve, avigate ^a^T2.0593^ea^ cha (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto ^a^V2.0528^ea^ dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. [03] ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaa ^a^M2.0452^ea^ dhammo bahiddhaa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] bahiddhaa dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa purejaata.m, aahaara.m. (1)
[03] ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammo ca bahiddhaa dhammassa purejaata.m, aahaara.m. (2)

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T2.0594^ea^ cha, naaaramma.ne cha, naadhipatiyaa cha (sa.mkhitta.m, sabbattha cha kaatabbaa), navippayutte cha, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa cha, novigate cha, noavigate cattaari (eva.m ga.netabba.m)

[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.
[03] 10^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve...pe0... magge dve...pe0... avigate dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ajjhattaaramma.no ^a^T2.0598^ea^ ^a^V2.0534^ea^ dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- ajjhattaaramma.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne ajjhattaaramma.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. [03] bahiddhaaramma.no ^a^M2.0457^ea^ dhammo bahiddhaaramma.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- bahiddhaaramma.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ajjhattaaramma.no dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ajjhatta.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m paccavekkhati, ajjhattaaramma.na.m ajjhatta.m dibba.m cakkhu.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m sotadhaatu.m...pe0... iddhividha~naa.na.m...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m paccavekkhati. ariyaa ajjhattaaramma.ne pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. ajjhattaaramma.ne ajjhatte khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha ajjhattaaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ajjhattaaramma.naa ajjhattaa khandhaa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ajjhattaaramma.no dhammo bahiddhaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T2.0599^ea^ paccayo -- bahiddhaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m ^a^V2.0535^ea^ paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m paccavekkhati. ajjhattaaramma.na.m bahiddhaa dibba.m cakkhu.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m sotadhaatu.m...pe0... iddhividha~naa.na.m...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m paccavekkhati, ajjhattaaramma.ne bahiddhaa khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati...pe0... cetopariya~naa.nena ajjhattaaramma.nabahiddhaacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, ajjhattaaramma.naa bahiddhaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaaramma.no dhammo bahiddhaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- bahiddhaaramma.na.m bahiddhaa dibba.m cakkhu.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m sotadhaatu.m paccavekkhati. iddhividha~naa.na.m...pe0... cetopariya~naa.na.m...pe0... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m...pe0... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m...pe0... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m paccavekkhati. bahiddhaaramma.ne bahiddhaa khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati...pe0... cetopariya~naa.nena bahiddhaaramma.nabahiddhaacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. bahiddhaaramma.naa ^a^M2.0458^ea^ bahiddhaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] bahiddhaaramma.no dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m ^a^T2.0600^ea^ katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati. ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, bahiddhaaramma.ne pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. bahiddhaaramma.na.m ajjhatta.m dibba.m cakkhu.m paccavekkhati, dibba.m sotadhaatu.m... iddhividha~naa.na.m... cetopariya~naa.na.m... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m... bahiddhaaramma.ne ajjhatte khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha ajjhattaaramma.no raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. bahiddhaaramma.naa ajjhattaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ajjhattaaramma.no ^a^V2.0536^ea^ dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ajjhatta.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. ajjhattaaramma.na.m ajjhatta.m dibba.m cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... dibba.m sotadhaatu.m...pe0... iddhividha~naa.na.m... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... ajjhattaaramma.ne ajjhatte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa ajjhattaaramma.no raago ^a^T2.0601^ea^ uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- ajjhattaaramma.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] 15^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaaramma.no dhammo bahiddhaaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- bahiddhaaramma.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] bahiddhaaramma.no ^a^M2.0459^ea^ dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m... phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. bahiddhaaramma.na.m ajjhatta.m dibba.m cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... dibba.m sotadhaatu.m... iddhividha~naa.na.m... cetopariya~naa.na.m... pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m... yathaakammuupaga~naa.na.m... anaagata.msa~naa.na.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, bahiddhaaramma.ne ajjhatte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa ajjhattaaramma.no raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. [03] 16^b^.^eb^ ajjhattaaramma.no dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa ajjhattaaramma.naa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ajjhattaaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ajjhattaaramma.no ^a^V2.0537^ea^ dhammo bahiddhaaramma.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena ^a^T2.0602^ea^ paccayo -- ajjhattaaramma.na.m cuticitta.m bahiddhaaramma.nassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. ajjhattaaramma.na.m bhava"nga.m bahiddhaaramma.naaya aavajjanaaya anantarapaccayena paccayo. ajjhattaaramma.naa khandhaa bahiddhaaramma.nassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. ajjhattaaramma.na.m anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaaramma.no dhammo bahiddhaaramma.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa bahiddhaaramma.naa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m bahiddhaaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. bahiddhaaramma.na.m anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa... maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] bahiddhaaramma.no dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- bahiddhaaramma.na.m cuticitta.m ajjhattaaramma.nassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. bahiddhaaramma.na.m bhava"nga.m ajjhattaaramma.naaya aavajjanaaya anantarapaccayena ^a^M2.0460^ea^ paccayo. bahiddhaaramma.naa khandhaa ajjhattaaramma.nassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. [03] 18^b^.^eb^ ajjhattaaramma.no ^a^T2.0603^ea^ dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ajjhattaaramma.no dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- ajjhattaaramma.naa ^a^V2.0538^ea^ aniccaanupassanaa, dukkhaanupassanaa, anattaanupassanaa, ajjhattaaramma.naaya aniccaanupassanaaya, dukkhaanupassanaaya, anattaanupassanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 20^b^.^eb^ bahiddhaaramma.no dhammo bahiddhaaramma.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- bahiddhaaramma.naa aniccaanupassanaa, dukkhaanupassanaa, anattaanupassanaa bahiddhaaramma.naaya aniccaanupassanaaya, dukkhaanupassanaaya, anattaanupassanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] bahiddhaaramma.no dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- bahiddhaaramma.naa aniccaanupassanaa ^a^T2.0604^ea^, dukkhaanupassanaa, anattaanupassanaa ajjhattaaramma.naaya aniccaanupassanaaya, dukkhaanupassanaaya, anattaanupassanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 21^b^.^eb^ ajjhattaaramma.no ^a^M2.0461^ea^ dhammo ajjhattaaramma.nassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa ajjhattaaramma.naa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ajjhattaaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)
