[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tighaa hetuu sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)
[03] (anidassanaappa.tighamuulakeyeva ^a^V2.0558^ea^ iminaa kaara.nena satta pa~nhaa vibhajitabbaa.)

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ruupe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^M2.0478^ea^ ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. sanidassanasappa.tighaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... anidassanasappa.tighaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa ^a^T2.0627^ea^, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti...pe0... vatthu.m... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m... anidassanaappa.tighe khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, cetopariya~naa.nena anidassanaappa.tighacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... anidassanaappa.tighaa ^a^V2.0559^ea^ khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ruupa.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

[03] anidassanasappa.tigho ^a^T2.0628^ea^ ^a^M2.0479^ea^ dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... phala.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. vatthu.m... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m... anidassanaappa.tighe khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaadhipati sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] (anidassanaappa.tighamuulake sattapi pa~nhaa vibhajitabbaa, adhipati tividharuupasa"ngahena.)

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho ^a^T2.0629^ea^ ^a^V2.0560^ea^ dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa... maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 35^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho ^a^M2.0480^ea^ dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisa.m).

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m saadhuka.m kaatabba.m. a~n~nama~n~napaccaye pa.ticcavaare a~n~nama~n~nasadisa.m, nissayapaccaye pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m).

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- va.n.nasampada.m patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m...pe0... va.n.nasampadaa saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa ^a^T2.0630^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo ^a^V2.0561^ea^ -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- cakkhusampada.m patthayamaano...pe0... kaayasampada.m... saddasampada.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbasampada.m patthayamaano daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m... utu.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti siila.m samaadiyati. uposathakamma.m, jhaana.m... vipassana.m... magga.m... abhi~n~na.m... samaapatti.m uppaadeti paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. cakkhusampadaa...pe0... pho.t.thabbasampadaa, utu, senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m... jhaana.m... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m ^a^M2.0481^ea^ jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m, kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... bhojana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. saddhaa ...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa, kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... bhojana.m saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^T2.0631^ea^ ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... sadde...pe0... pho.t.thabbe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena ^a^V2.0562^ea^ paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu.m... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m... aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho ca anidassanaappa.tigho ca dhammaa anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. ruupaayatana~nca vatthu ca anidassanaappa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanasappa.tigho ^a^M2.0482^ea^ ca anidassanaappa.tigho ca dhammaa anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^baaramma.napurejaata.m ^a^T2.0632^ea^, vatthupurejaata.mb^. cakkhaayatana~nca vatthu ca...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca vatthu ca anidassanaappa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sanidassanasappa.tigho ca anidassanaappa.tigho ca dhammaa anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. ruupaayatana~nca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo ^a^V2.0563^ea^ -- pacchaajaataa anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanasappa.tighassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] (eva.m satta pa~nhaa vibhajitabbaa, tividharuupasa"ngaho.) (7)

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu ^a^T2.0633^ea^ maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^M2.0483^ea^ ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa cetanaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa cetanaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] (eva.m satta pa~nhaa sahajaataa naanaakkha.nikaa iminaa kaara.nena vibhajitabbaa, tividharuupasa"ngaho.) (7)

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho ^a^V2.0564^ea^ dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako anidassanaappa.tigho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tigho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa ^a^T2.0634^ea^ vipaakapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaakaa anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] (eva.m satta pa~nhaa vitthaaretabbaa, pavattipa.tisandhi.) (7)

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tighaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ^a^M2.0484^ea^ anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo. kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tighaa aahaaraa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa aahaaraa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena ^a^V2.0565^ea^ paccayo. kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa sanidassanasappa.tighassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] (eva.m satta pa~nhaa ^a^T2.0635^ea^ pavattipa.tisandhi vibhajitabbaa, sattasupi kaba.liikaaro aahaaro kaatabbo.) (7)

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tighaa indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. ruupajiivitindriya.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tighaa indriyaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa indriyaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. ruupajiivitindriya.m sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] (eva.m pavattipa.tisandhi satta pa~nhaa vibhajitabbaa, ruupajiivitindriya~nca ante ante.) (7)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigho ^a^T2.0636^ea^ ^a^M2.0485^ea^ ca anidassanaappa.tigho ca dhammaa anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m ^a^V2.0566^ea^ indriyapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayindriya~nca kaayavi~n~naa.na~nca kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaappa.tigho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m sampayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ^a^T2.0637^ea^ khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa sanidassanasappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa ^a^M2.0486^ea^ ^a^V2.0567^ea^ khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanasappa.tighassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] (avasesaa pa~nca pa~nhaa eva.m vitthaaretabbaa. sahajaataa, pacchaajaataa.)

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- anidassanasappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa ekassa mahaabhuutassa atthipaccayena paccayo. anidassanasappa.tighaa mahaabhuutaa anidassanasappa.tighaana.m ^a^T2.0638^ea^ cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pho.t.thabbaayatana.m cakkhaayatanassa...pe0... rasaayatanassa atthipaccayena paccayo. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa ekassa mahaabhuutassa atthipaccayena paccayo. utusamu.t.thaanaa mahaabhuutaa anidassanasappa.tighaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. asa~n~nasattaana.m anidassanasappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0.... (1)
[03] anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo sanidassanasappa.tighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] (pa.ticcavaare nissayapaccayasadisa.m.)

[03] anidassanasappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanasappa.tighaa mahaabhuutaa anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^V2.0568^ea^ ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (yaava asa~n~nasattaa vitthaaretabbaa). ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m, sadde...pe0... pho.t.thabbe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] (avasesaa ^a^M2.0487^ea^ cattaaro pa~nhaa vitthaaretabbaa. pa.ticcavaare sahajaatapaccayasadisaa, ninnaanaakara.naa.) (7)

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ anidassanaappa.tigho dhammo anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa ^a^T2.0639^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tigho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... aapodhaatu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m...pe0... aapodhaatu itthindriyassa...pe0... kaba.liikaaraahaarassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m aapodhaatu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu.m... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m... aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, vatthu anidassanaappa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaappa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa anidassanaappa.tighassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ anidassanaappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (eva.m avasesaa cha pa~nhaa vibhajitabbaa. sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriyampi kaatabbaa). (7)

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ sanidassanasappa.tigho ca anidassanaappa.tigho ca dhammaa anidassanaappa.tighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupaayatana~nca vatthu ca anidassanaappa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo ^a^T2.0640^ea^. (1)

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V2.0570^ea^ satta, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate ekaviisa, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye ekaviisa, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate cha, pacchaajaate satta, aasevane eka.m, kamme satta, vipaake satta, aahaare satta, indriye nava, jhaane satta, magge satta, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte a.t.tha, atthiyaa pa~ncaviisa, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate pa~ncaviisa.
